name: Our Lady of Lourdes Parish
description: Our Lady of Lourdes Church, a simple wooden chapel adorned with carved wooden beams and stained glass images of Martin Luther King, Jr., Sojourner Truth and other black leaders, gathers Catholics to worship every week. Today, the African American, Hispanic, Samoan and Filipino communities are still thriving to serve the underprivileged and those seeking to find God at Our Lady of Lourdes Parish. All Hallows Church stands proudly on a hill overlooking Hunters Point for over 100 years. A Gospel Ma
